name: Push That Ball
description:
Still In Development

My idea for this game is simple, Soccer / football game with 1 goal.

feature:

  • sign in and sign up with Firebase
  • Save your game data with Firebase Database
  • Multiplayer PVP using Photon Engine PUN2

Gameplay:

  • Whoever is scoring 5 goal first win the game.

i use kaykit assets for this game.
